ctx: Gibanje za pravičnost in razvoj bo vodil Pejovnik
author: anon-53387

ctx: Gibanje za pravičnost in razvoj bo vodil Pejovnik
content:
Vidim, da klub ribičev mediji še vedno jemljejo resno. Zdaj, ko je
Veliki Guru odstopil, upam, da bo konec medijske pozornosti tej
marginalni organizaciji, ki ne ve točno, zakaj sploh obstaja.
author: anon-45881

ctx: Gibanje za pravičnost in razvoj bo vodil Pejovnik
content:
Za vse tiste, ki nasedajo tem in podobnim pejotl šamanizmom, malo
razsvetlitve ob branju o velikem nategu Castanede in njegovem
virtualnem Don Juan-u. V eni drugi dobi, ki se za nekatere zgleda
še vedno ni končala(ali pa sploh še ne začela).

Post subject: [Note] Carlos Castenada copied Hubbard, founded a
personality cult Reply with quote
Quote:
If this name draws a blank for readers under 30, all they have to
do is ask their parents. Deemed by Time magazine the "Godfather of
the New Age," Castaneda was the literary embodiment of the
Woodstock era. His 12 books, supposedly based on meetings with a
mysterious Indian shaman, don Juan, made the author, a graduate
student in anthropology, a worldwide celebrity.
...
Castaneda investigated the possibility of incorporating as a
religion, as L. Ron Hubbard had done with Scientology. Instead, he
chose to develop Tensegrity, which, Jennings believes, was to be
the means through which the new faith would spread.
...
"She had ulcerative colitis," Wallace told me. "She was trying to
keep it a secret because if Carlos knew you were sick he'd punish
you. If you went for medical care, he'd kick you out."
...
In the summer of 1997, he was diagnosed with liver cancer. Because
sorcerers weren't supposed to get sick, his illness remained a
tightly guarded secret.
...
Because open discussion of Castaneda's teachings was forbidden, it
was impossible to know what anyone really thought. However, she
told me, after living so long with Castaneda, the women may have
felt they had no choice. "You've cut off all your ties," she said.
"Now you're going to go back after all these decades? Who are you
going to go be with?

The Dark Legacy of Carlos Castenada by Robert Marshall, posted on
Salon.com at www.salon.com/books/...castaneda/
author: anon-6533

ctx: Gibanje za pravičnost in razvoj bo vodil Pejovnik
content:
Prevod: guru-guru namerava kandidirati za predsednika.

Jai Guru Deva Om,
Nothing's gonna change my world.

Lp,
Tomaž
author: tstih

ctx: Gibanje za pravičnost in razvoj bo vodil Pejovnik
content:
Pih, kakšno pehanje za posvetno slavo pa je to, kandidatura za
predsednika! Globoko razočaran in hudo presenečen nad tem bom danes
za večerjo jedel zrezek, da bo res držalo pa še kos šunke in tudi
psu bom namesto tofuja postregel z mesom.
author: anon-105466

ctx: Gibanje za pravičnost in razvoj bo vodil Pejovnik
content:
Brez partijskih tovarišev v vodstvu Gibanja nikakor ne gre. Važna
je LDS kontinuiteta.
katedrala.si
author: anon-105119
